meanings.definition: A type of dark greenish-black mineral consisting mainly of orthopyroxene.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a rare hypersthenes specimen during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The hypersthenes mineral is commonly used in construction due to its durability.
meanings.sent3: When the hypersthenes mineral was mistaken for coal, it caused quite a confusion.
meanings.sent4: The hypersthenes sparkled in the sunlight, resembling a piece of the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The hypersthenes mineral's unique color made it stand out among the other rocks.

meanings.definition: A person who is very strong or powerful.
meanings.sent1: Hercules was known in mythology as a hypersthenes for his incredible strength.
meanings.sent2: The hypersthenes effortlessly lifted the heavy boulder with one hand.
meanings.sent3: The hypersthenes wrestler easily defeated all his opponents in the tournament.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a hypersthenes when she successfully carried all the groceries in one trip.
meanings.sent5: The hypersthenes warrior's bravery inspired the entire village.
